text: Joshua Andrew Koenig (August 17, 1968 - February 25, 2010) was an American actor, director, activist, editor and writer. Koenig is probably best known for playing Mike Seaver's best friend, Richard "Boner" Stabone on the sitcom Growing Pains. He was in 25 episodes of Growing Pains and also guest starred on episodes of 21 Jump Street, My Two Dads and My Sister Sam. Koenig starred in the 2003 fan film Batman: Dead End where he played The Joker. His father is Walter Koenig also an actor. Koenig disappeared on February 14, 2010. His parents said he showed signs of depression before he went missing. His body was found hanging from a tree in Vancouver's Stanley Park, on February 25, 2010. == Filmography == Movie Year Tíle Role Notes 1973 Adam-12 Little Boy 1985–1989 Growing Pains Richard "Boner" Stabone 1987 My Sister Sam Sheriff Junius Candle 1988 21 Jump Street Wally 1989 My Two Dads Jon 1990 G.I.
